alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:32PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Walla Walla and central Columbia Counties through 800 PM PDT... At 731 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Ski Bluewood, or 10 miles south of Dayton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dayton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington; Northwest Blue Mountains
